## PBReflection.hasVertexAttribute() method

Check if specified vertex attribute was used by the program

**Signature:**

```typescript

```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  attrib | number | The vertex attribute to check |
